p: Line 45 – 47: This line can be more precise. Also, it seems untimely because at Line 41 -44 an example is given of ‘disease and plant invasion’. Line 45 – 47 is saying the same thing again. Only difference is in Line 41 -44 the reader is told the potential outcome of ‘disease and plant invasion’, and in Line 45 – 47 the outcome is vague but with more references.
